properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
More about Jesus
would I know,
more of His grace
to others show;
More of His saving
fullness see,
more of His love who
died for me.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
More, more about Jesus,
more, more about Jesus;
More of His saving
fullness see,
more of His love
who died for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
More about Jesus
let me learn,
more of his holy
will discern;
Spirit of God,
my teacher be,
showing the things
of Christ to me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
More about Jesus,
in his Word,
holding communion
with my Lord;
Hearing his voice
in every line,
making each faithful
saying mine.
